languages.text: {n}В изумрудных глазах вспыхивает удивление, и горечь, и растерянность.{/n} "Значит, в ином мире мы тоже шли рука об руку, элантах. И раз сей оберег ты держишь сейчас в руках... мой Путь оборвался раньше твоего".

{n}Her emerald-green eyes light up with surprise, sorrow, and confusion all at once.{/n} "So you and I walked arm in arm in this other world too, elantach. And since the keepsake is now in your possession... my Path was cut short before yours."
languages.original_text: {n}В изумрудных глазах вспыхивает удивление, и горечь, и растерянность.{/n} "Значит, в ином мире мы тоже шли рука об руку, элантах. И раз сей оберег ты держишь сейчас в руках... мой Путь оборвался раньше твоего".

traits.locale_text: {n}Her emerald-green eyes light up with surprise, frustration, and confusion all at once.{/n} "So you and I walked arm in arm in this other world too, elantach. And since you are the one holding the talisman now... my Path was cut short before yours was."

{n}Her emerald-green eyes light up with surprise, frustration, and confusion all at once.{/n} "So you and I walked arm in arm in this other world too, elantach. And since you are the one holding the talisman now... my Path was cut short before yours was."

{n}Her emerald-green eyes light up with surprise, sorrow, and confusion all at once.{/n} "So you and I walked arm in arm in this other world too, elantach. And since the keepsake is now in your possession... my Path was cut short before yours."

{n}Her emerald-green eyes light up with surprise, sorrow, and confusion all at once.{/n} "So you and I walked arm in arm in this other world too, elantach. And since the keepsake is now in your possession... my Path was cut short before yours."

{n}Her emerald-green eyes light up with surprise, sorrow, and confusion all at once.{/n} "So you and I walked arm in arm in this other world too, elantach. And since the keepsake is now in your possession... my Path was cut short before yours."

{n}Her emerald-green eyes light up with surprise, sorrow, and confusion all at once.{/n} "So you and I walked arm in arm in this other world too, elantach. And since the keepsake is now in your possession... my Path was cut short before yours."

languages.text: {n}Sus ojos de color verde esmeralda se iluminan con sorpresa, pesar y confusión a la vez.{/n} «Entonces, también caminamos junt{mf|o|a}s en este otro mundo, elantach. Y, puesto que tienes ese recordatorio... mi senda terminó antes que la tuya».
languages.original_text: {n}Her emerald-green eyes light up with surprise, sorrow, and confusion all at once.{/n} "So you and I walked arm in arm in this other world too, elantach. And since the keepsake is now in your possession... my Path was cut short before yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus ojos de color verde esmeralda se iluminan con sorpresa, pesar y confusión a la vez.{/n} «Entonces, también caminamos junt{mf|o|a}s en este otro mundo, elantach. Y, puesto que tienes ese recordatorio... mi senda terminó antes que la tuya».

languages.text: {n}Ses yeux vert émeraude brillent de surprise, de tristesse et de désarroi.{/n} « Ainsi, vous et moi avons aussi marché côte à côte dans cet autre monde, elantach. Et puisque le talisman est désormais entre vos mains... cela signifie que ma Voie a été écourtée avant la vôtre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her emerald-green eyes light up with surprise, sorrow, and confusion all at once.{/n} "So you and I walked arm in arm in this other world too, elantach. And since the keepsake is now in your possession... my Path was cut short before yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses yeux vert émeraude brillent de surprise, de tristesse et de désarroi.{/n} « Ainsi, vous et moi avons aussi marché côte à côte dans cet autre monde, elantach. Et puisque le talisman est désormais entre vos mains... cela signifie que ma Voie a été écourtée avant la vôtre. »

languages.text: {n}彼女のエメラルドの瞳が、驚きと、悲しみと、混乱とで同時に輝く。{/n}「ではこの異世界でもあなたと私は仲間だったというのか、エランタ。そして形見が今あなたの手にあるということは…私の道はあなたより早く終わってしまったということか」
languages.original_text: {n}Her emerald-green eyes light up with surprise, sorrow, and confusion all at once.{/n} "So you and I walked arm in arm in this other world too, elantach. And since the keepsake is now in your possession... my Path was cut short before yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女のエメラルドの瞳が、驚きと、悲しみと、混乱とで同時に輝く。{/n}「ではこの異世界でもあなたと私は仲間だったというのか、エランタ。そして形見が今あなたの手にあるということは…私の道はあなたより早く終わってしまったということか」

languages.text: {n}她翠绿色的双眼中闪烁着惊喜、悲伤与困惑。{/n}“原来你我也曾在另一个世界携手前进，外界人。可既然那件信物在你的手中……那说明我的道途早早地结束了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her emerald-green eyes light up with surprise, sorrow, and confusion all at once.{/n} "So you and I walked arm in arm in this other world too, elantach. And since the keepsake is now in your possession... my Path was cut short before yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}她翠绿色的双眼中闪烁着惊喜、悲伤与困惑。{/n}“原来你我也曾在另一个世界携手前进，外界人。可既然那件信物在你的手中……那说明我的道途早早地结束了。”

languages.text: {n}Ihre smaragdgrünen Augen leuchten auf, vor Überraschung, Trauer und Verwirrung gleichzeitig.{/n} "Wir beide sind also auch in dieser Welt Arm in Arm gewandelt, Elantach. Und da sich das Souvenir nun in Eurem Besitz befindet ... wurde mein Pfad vor dem Euren beendet."
languages.original_text: {n}Her emerald-green eyes light up with surprise, sorrow, and confusion all at once.{/n} "So you and I walked arm in arm in this other world too, elantach. And since the keepsake is now in your possession... my Path was cut short before yours."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre smaragdgrünen Augen leuchten auf, vor Überraschung, Trauer und Verwirrung gleichzeitig.{/n} "Wir beide sind also auch in dieser Welt Arm in Arm gewandelt, Elantach. Und da sich das Souvenir nun in Eurem Besitz befindet ... wurde mein Pfad vor dem Euren beendet."
